text: If cancer is in the ethmoid sinus, treatment may include the following:          - Surgery followed by radiation therapy.    - A clinical trial of combination chemotherapy before surgery or radiation therapy.    - A clinical trial of combination chemotherapy after surgery or other cancer treatment.        If cancer is in the sphenoid sinus, treatment is the same as for nasopharyngeal cancer, usually radiation therapy with or without chemotherapy. (See the PDQ summary on Nasopharyngeal Cancer T
